org.vertx.java.core

Interface ClientSSLSupport<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SSLSupport<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpClient, NetClient

    public interface ClientSSLSupport<T>
extends SSLSupport<T>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isTrustAll() 
      T setTrustAll(boolean trustAll)
      If you want an SSL client to trust *all* server certificates rather than match them against those in its trust store, you can set this to true.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.vertx.java.core.SSLSupport

        getKeyStorePassword, getKeyStorePath, getTrustStorePassword, getTrustStorePath, isSSL, setKeyStorePassword, setKeyStorePath, setSSL, setSSLContext, setTrustStorePassword, setTrustStorePath

    • Method Detail

      • setTrustAll

        T setTrustAll(boolean trustAll)
        If you want an SSL client to trust *all* server certificates rather than match them against those in its trust store, you can set this to true.

        Use this with caution as you may be exposed to "main in the middle" attacks

        Parameters:
        trustAll - Set to true if you want to trust all server certificates

      • isTrustAll

        boolean isTrustAll()
        Returns:
        true if this client will trust all server certificates.
